DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this PMS study was to monitor and assess the safety of Mobic® intramuscular injection (7.5mg ~ 15mg, q.d.) up to 3 days (in case of need for prolonged treatment, switch to Mobic® capsule therapy was possible) in Korean patients with osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Mobic Inj. (Meloxicam) for the Patients With OA or RA: Observational Study
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA: diagnosed as osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis EXCLUSION CRITERIA: 1. Known hypersensitivity to meloxicam 2. Cross hypersensitivity to aspirin and other nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drugs 3. Symptoms of asthma, rhinitis, angioneurotic edema, or urticaria following the administration of aspirin or other NSAIDs 4. Active peptic ulceration 5. Severe hepatic failure. 6. Nondialysed severe renal insufficiency 7. Children and adolescents aged 15 years or less 8. Pregnancy or breastfeeding
